item.description: Black Rebel Motorcycle is coming to House of Blues Boston on May 3rd. It's a long ways away but tickets could sell out. Their new album "Specter At The Feast" is dropping on March 19th. Tickets went on sale today. GA is $31.65.Â  I've never been to House of Blues Boston venue but The Landsdowne is literally right next door so I figure we can meet up there around 6:00 and then line up around 6:30-6:45 pm. I'll update with my number as the event draws closer . . .
item.name: Black Rebel Motorcycle Club
